title: Unity Catalog Listing Guide: Packaging Data and Models
summary: Hands‑on steps to publish Delta tables and ML artifacts with evidence to Databricks Marketplace.
bodyMd:
## Checklist
- Delta OPTIMIZE + Z‑ORDER
- Column docs and units
- Tags: domain, license, sensitivity
- Evidence bundle attached
- Quickstart notebook

## Quality Gates
- Utility ≥ threshold
- Privacy ≤ bound
- Docs complete
